name: School of Witches
description:
This is a tower defense game that wants to get away from static and 2D patterns with little camera movement and make gameplay more fun with areas to explore as you navigate the scene controlling the little witch that must protect the witches' schools of the enemy attack.

The game is designed to have 15 stages, and dozens of enemies that alternate between air and ground attacks, and for this you must choose carefully their towers for defense.

The towers also have several levels and 2 types of special tower (unlocked as you advance in the game)
